name: Tidy Tech
description:
What a terrible mess? And where did so many insects come from? Shoo! Shoo! Hey TD ...

Can cleaning be fascinating? This little smart space station superintendent will show you how to get pleasure from it. You need to show that you are smart, able to react quickly and repair broken things.
You control a TD robot. To get out of the level, fix broken panels bypassing obstacles. But do not yawn, arrogant beetles will break it all again.
